episode_event_summer_2025/4001_1001_0200: Oh! Were you in the middle of something?
episode_event_summer_2025/4001_1001_0300:
Yes, I’m working on next week’s tournament
and some other Champion duties.
episode_event_summer_2025/4001_1001_0600:
Um, I was planning to hang out with Skyla
and some others next week, and I was
wondering if you’d like to join us.
episode_event_summer_2025/4001_1001_0800:
I need to put together my research report on
myths next week...so I might not have time.
episode_event_summer_2025/4001_1001_0900:
I’d love to, but I’ll have to pass this time.
I’m sorry.
episode_event_summer_2025/4001_1001_1000: Oh! That’s OK! Sorry to bother you!
episode_event_summer_2025/4001_1001_1100: Not at all. Thank you for inviting me, Dawn.
episode_event_summer_2025/4001_1001_1200: It seems being a Champion’s a lot of work.
episode_event_summer_2025/4001_1001_1400:
Were you just talking to Cynthia? What’d she
say about next week?
episode_event_summer_2025/4002_1001_0100: So yeah, that’s what’s going on.
episode_event_summer_2025/4002_1001_0200:
I’m worried Cynthia might not be taking
enough breaks.
episode_event_summer_2025/4002_1001_0300:
Cynthia doesn’t seem to find work tiring.
She must be really invested in it.
episode_event_summer_2025/4002_1001_0400:
If she doesn’t remember to take breaks,
she may never stop working.
episode_event_summer_2025/4002_1001_0700: We’re worried about you too, young master.
episode_event_summer_2025/4002_1001_0900:
You check on Pasio Academy all the time,
on top of managing the island, riiight?
episode_event_summer_2025/4002_1001_1000:
It’s super cool that you work hard, but you
gotta take a break once in a while!
episode_event_summer_2025/4002_1001_1100:
If you got sick, all that work would be for
nothing, Lear.
episode_event_summer_2025/4002_1001_1400: Let’s all help Lear and Cynthia get some rest!
episode_event_summer_2025/6801_1031_0100:
What’s the plan for our
holiday?
episode_event_summer_2025/6801_1001_0100:
It’s easy for me to overthink things if I’m
trying to ensure I have fun.
episode_event_summer_2025/6801_1001_0200: Sometimes it’s good to just go with the flow!
episode_event_summer_2025/6801_1001_0300:
After all, it’s a vacation! Sit back, relax,
and enjoy it!
episode_event_summer_2025/4003_1001_0200:
We don’t want you or Lear to overwork
yourselves!
episode_event_summer_2025/4003_1001_0300:
So we’d like to give you a day off!
As a gift!
episode_event_summer_2025/4003_1001_0500: What about my duties as Champion?
episode_event_summer_2025/4003_1001_0700:
The Pasio Neo Champions said they can
cover for you!
episode_event_summer_2025/4003_1001_0800:
They were excited to give the other
Champions a break!
episode_event_summer_2025/4003_1001_1000: And about your report on myths...
episode_event_summer_2025/4003_1001_1100:
If that’s all you have to work on, you can
free up some time for a break, right?
episode_event_summer_2025/4003_1001_1300: I do want to spend time with you all, so...
episode_event_summer_2025/4003_1001_1400: Sure, I’ll take you up on that day off!
episode_event_summer_2025/4003_1001_1600:
We already talked to Lear and the others
and secured a spot!
episode_event_summer_2025/4003_1001_1700: Now, let’s go buy a vacay outfit!
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1101_0100: On the day of the holiday...
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_0300:
I personally welcome each and every one
of you, and—
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_0500:
Er... I was told to take a break today
too, but...
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_0600:
I give you special permission to use my
private beach!
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_0700: So please, relax and have a good time!
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_0800: Thank you. I look forward to a lovely day.
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_0900:
Such beautiful weather... I think I’ll have a
wonderful holiday.
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_1000:
It’d be so refreshing to go for a swim.
What do you think, Milotic?
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_1300:
She said she’ll come after helping her
Neo Champion friends.
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_1400:
After all that talk about me taking a break...
She really is responsible, isn’t she.
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_1500: Oh, you two are already here.
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_1700: Think you’ll be able to rest today?
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_1800: Yes, thanks to everyone pitching in.
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_1900:
This reminds me of when I’d relax at
your villa.
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_2100:
Let’s take a break from battling for
a while...
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_2200: and make the most of this day!
episode_event_summer_2025/4004_1001_2400: I can feel my creativity burnin’!
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_0100: Glad we got to swim together?
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_0200: We should do this more often.
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_0300: Heeey, Cynthia! Want something to drink?
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_0500: Oh, did you go in the water?
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_0600:
Yes, Milotic and I went for a swim and
loved it.
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_0700: But...gazing at the ocean is just as nice.
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_0800: I can feel the quiet passage of time.
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_0900:
Yeah, moving around all the time can get
tiring!
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_1000:
Even planes and bird Pokémon can’t fly all
the time!
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_1100:
It’s important to take it slow sometimes and
make time to Roost!
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_1300:
Well, I’m gonna pass out the rest of these
drinks!
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_1500:
I wonder if there’s buried treasure
around here.
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_2100:
She really is! You did a great job training
her, but that’s no surprise, coming from you!
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_2200:
A Grass-type Pokémon that flies in the sky...
That fits your vibe perfectly, Skyla!
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_2300:
Thanks! Just like how Jumpluff circles the
globe, blown by seasonal winds...
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_2400: I’ll keep flying high as a pilot!
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_2500:
If we use my cargo plane, we could get to
your home of Sinnoh in just a hop, skip,
and a jump!
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_2600:
The views while flying in the sky like
Jumpluff would be amazing!
episode_event_summer_2025/4005_1001_2700:
We should take a high-flying trip together
someday, Gardenia!
episode_event_summer_2025/4006_1001_0100:
Nothin’s gonna happen if I just keep
hiding here.
episode_event_summer_2025/4006_1001_0200: I just gotta go for it and talk to her.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_0100:
You want me and Milotic to model for your
painting?
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_0300:
There’re so many works of art featuring
Milotic.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_0400:
So as an aspiring artist, I want to challenge
myself and paint one.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_0500:
But I know you’re here on holiday, so I felt
bad about askin’.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_0700: I don’t mind if Milotic doesn’t.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_0900:
But are you sure you don’t want to paint just
Milotic?
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_1000:
Yeah. I wanna paint a beautiful sync pair,
so...
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_1200: OK, then I’d be happy to.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_1300: Sorry to be a bother. I owe you.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_1400: I hope you like how your painting turns out!
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_1500: To tell you the truth, I wasn’t sure about this.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_1600:
Like I said, lotsa professionals have already
painted Milotic...
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_1700: Hey, can I ask you somethin’?
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_1800:
You’re an expert on archeology and
Pokémon battles, right?
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_1900:
So you’re pretty much a pro. You ever feel
down when you fail?
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_2100:
But I got this far because of my passion for
those things.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_2200:
And I’ve had just as many fun times—
or even more.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_2400:
is all thanks to my friends who look out
for me.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_2500:
When I think about that, I stay strong even
through tough times.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_2600: Friends who always support you, huh.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_2700:
When something’s got you down, it can be
good to go on a trip!
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_2800:
Even Jumpluff circles the globe, blown by
seasonal winds!
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_3000:
It might be nice to travel the world
and paint.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_3100:
That sounds like an exciting dream. I hope
you achieve it one day.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_3200:
No time to waste. Lemme grab my art
supplies!
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_3300:
That takes me back. I used to feel lost and
unsure, until I found my path.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_3400: I suppose that’s how everyone feels.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_3600:
Yes. She reminded us of something
important.
episode_event_summer_2025/4007_1001_3700: I feel recharged and back to my roots!
episode_event_summer_2025/4008_1001_0100: Oh! Skyla! Are you alone? Where’s Cynthia?
episode_event_summer_2025/4008_1001_0200:
I’m just taking a stroll until Mela’s done
painting Cynthia and Milotic!
episode_event_summer_2025/4008_1001_0400: I wonder how that’ll turn out!
episode_event_summer_2025/4008_1001_0500: Let’s have her show us when she’s done.
episode_event_summer_2025/4008_1001_0600: You could’ve modeled for her too, Skyla.
episode_event_summer_2025/4008_1001_0700:
Your outfit looks so nice today! It would’ve
been lovely to paint.
episode_event_summer_2025/4008_1001_0900:
Today’s all about relaxing. Did you get
some rest?
episode_event_summer_2025/4008_1001_1100:
I love going all out with Pokémon battles
and events...
episode_event_summer_2025/4008_1001_1200: but taking it slow ain’t bad, either!
episode_event_summer_2025/4008_1001_1300:
Instead of shooting through the air like my
high-flying cannons and planes...
episode_event_summer_2025/4008_1001_1400:
I feel like I’m drifting through the sky like
Jumpluff!
episode_event_summer_2025/4008_1001_1500: Sounds like you really got to Roost today!
episode_event_summer_2025/4008_1001_1600: Our day of relaxation is coming to an end...
episode_event_summer_2025/4009_1001_0200: Cynthia and Milotic are so beautiful!
episode_event_summer_2025/4009_1001_0400:
At this rate, your art could be in a museum
one day.
episode_event_summer_2025/4009_1001_0600:
My heart feels like it’s on fire...
Thanks for letting me paint you two.
episode_event_summer_2025/4009_1001_0800: It was a valuable experience for us, too!
episode_event_summer_2025/4009_1001_0900:
Next time you paint something, please
show us!
episode_event_summer_2025/4009_1001_1000:
I look forward to seeing your next sweet
work of art!
episode_event_summer_2025/4009_1001_1200: Good luck! I’ll be cheering for you.
episode_event_summer_2025/4010_1001_0100: Thanks again for the lovely day!
episode_event_summer_2025/4010_1001_0400: I need to thank the Neo Champions later.
episode_event_summer_2025/4010_1001_0500:
Oh. By the way, is there something I can do
for you two?
episode_event_summer_2025/4010_1001_0600: Ask me anything! I’ll do my best!
episode_event_summer_2025/4010_1001_0700: I already had so much fun today, so I’m OK!
episode_event_summer_2025/4010_1001_0900: Hmm. I want to make sweets together.
episode_event_summer_2025/4010_1001_1000:
And have a Pokémon battle. And, um...
What else...
episode_event_summer_2025/4010_1001_1100: I just want to spend time with you, Cynthia!
episode_event_summer_2025/4010_1001_1300: Let’s keep going to the very last moment...
episode_event_summer_2025/4010_1001_1400: and make the most of this day!
episode_event_summer_2025/4010_1001_1500: Why don’t we have even MORE fun!
